feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Migration Zpool
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 16, 07:00 UTC  -  Jun 20, 16:00 UTC

Apr 10, 19:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/06/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/06/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 28, 07:00 UTC  -  Apr 30, 15:00 UTC

Apr 10, 10:10 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Apr 9, 20:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 28/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 30/04/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

Apr 10, 10:07 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Apr 10, 10:06 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Apr 9, 14:26 UTC
Update - The current maintenance will take more time than expected.

Below you can find the new end time of the operation.

Start time : 22/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 25/04/2025 15:00 UTC

Apr 2, 21:56 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 14/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 18/04/2025 15:00 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 16, 07:00 UTC  -  Apr 23, 18:00 UTC

Apr 8, 22:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect the availability of vMotion.

Start time : 16/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 23/04/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, customers may experience temporary service interruptions or difficulties accessing secure services.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.

Thank you for your understanding.
